pandas.replace_code:
def pivot_table(
    data,
    values=None,
    index=None,
    columns=None,
    aggfunc="mean",
    fill_value=None,
    margins=False,
    dropna=True,
    margins_name="All",
    observed=False,
) -> "DataFrame":
    index = _convert_by(index)
    columns = _convert_by(columns)

    if isinstance(aggfunc, list):
        pieces = []
        keys = []

        for func in aggfunc:
            table = data.pivot_table(
                values=values,
                index=index,
                columns=columns,
                fill_value=fill_value,
                aggfunc=func,
                margins=False,  # Disable margins for individual functions
                dropna=dropna,
                margins_name=margins_name,
                observed=observed,
            )
            pieces.append(table)
            keys.append(getattr(func, "__name__", func))

        # Concatenate the results of individual functions into a single DataFrame
        result = concat(pieces, keys=keys, axis=1)

        if margins:
            data = data[data.notna().all(axis=1)]
            result = _add_margins(
                result,
                data,
                values,
                rows=index,
                cols=columns,
                aggfunc=aggfunc[0],  # Use the first function for margins
                observed=dropna,
                margins_name=margins_name,
                fill_value=fill_value,
            )
        return result

    keys = index + columns
